review: It worked well until it dropped the network, and no rebooting will resolve the problem

review: Works as advertised & is so much faster than other media players. It feels like a quality unit too. Great to use with your Prime account.

review: Hooks right up to TV. Joined network instantly. Makes any HD TV a Smart TV. The prime programmimg is excellent, with more movies I think than Netflix.

review: Fire stick great product I wish in worked with movietube.com chrome cast does.

review: WOW!  If you have Amazon Prime, you HAVE to get this!  It opens up a whole new world of entertainment.  Can't believe we lived for so long without it!!

review: Easy set up and performs as described......a bargain for the price!  Instantly turns a wired  HD tv into a wireless tv.
